channel.title: Experiences | Spearmex
channel.description: Luxury Fishing & Spearfishing adventures in Punta Mita, Nayarit Mexico

item.title: La Tranquila
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
35' Everglades A/C cabin with Triples 300HP Motors
  • Length: 35 feet
  • Top speed: 45 mph
item.content:encoded: Spearmex offers the Everglades’ 35oLX, a spacious fishing cruiser that can comfortably accommodate up to six people. This boat is equipped with numerous rod holders and storage options, including a 66-gallon fish box at the transom and Taco’sTM 18-foot Grand Slam Outriggers. With amenities like a head with shower, well-equipped galley, electric grill, and air conditioning, this boat is perfect for family fishing trips. Enjoy ample living space below deck without compromising on fishing functionality. Explore the Everglades’ 35oLX and create unforgettable fishing experiences with your loved ones.

item.title: Riviera 45
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
Tqke in a peerless view from the top, fishing or Bluewater cruising in a classic Riviera 45' flybridge design. Offering you fine "easy living" lifestyle over three levels.
  • Length: 45 feet
  • Cruising Speed: 18/20 knots.
item.content:encoded:
Take in a breathtaking view from the top, whether you’re fishing or enjoying a blue-water cruising experience.

Our classic Riviera 45′ Flybridge design offers you a fine “easy living lifestyle” over three levels. It’s hard to decide what aspect of the Riviera 45 Open Flybridge guests will enjoy the most, as it provides exceptional performance for both entertaining and blue-water fishing. Friends and family will delight in the spacious, well-designed cockpit with its convenient “stair ladder” to the flybridge, as well as the luxurious saloon. Truly, every part of life on board is designed for your utmost enjoyment.

Experience luxury on a whole new level, setting new standards for a yacht of this size. Guests will love retreating to the accommodation deck, featuring a master stateroom with a designer ensuite located forward. Additionally, treat your family and friends to the full-beam guest stateroom aft, which includes a VIP ensuite that conveniently doubles as the day head. The yacht is equipped with 2 x Caterpillar Mg’s 510HP motors, STARLINK Satellite High Speed Internet, and an Entertainment System with Netflix and Sirius Satellite Radio. The cabin includes a living room, dining area in the salon, and a bathroom. With two staterooms, the yacht offers ample space for everyone on board.

item.title: Spearo 4
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.content:encoded:
Four Winns 31ft

  • Two motors x 300 HP
  • Maker: Four Winns
  • Floating Water Bed
  • Sun deck
  • Retractable Shade
  • Full size head bathroom
  • Soundsystem
  • Day cruising in water sports

item.title: Spearo 3
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
Spearmex presents the SEA HUNT CENTER CONSOLE, powered by a powerful 175 HP SUZUKI 4 STROKE OUTBOARD engine.
  • Length: 24 feet
  • Max Speed:Â  25 knots
  • Max Capacity: 4 pax (inshore) 2 pax (offshore)
item.content:encoded:
Spearmex presents the SEA HUNT CENTER CONSOLE, powered by a powerful 175 HP SUZUKI 4 STROKE OUTBOARD engine.

This top-of-the-line fishing boat is designed to accommodate up to 4 PAX (inshore) or 2 PAX (offshore). With its latest design and exceptional performance, even in adverse weather conditions, it ensures an incredible experience at sea. The boat features a spacious deck with an extendable shade, a plotter, Fishfinder HDI, marine VHF radio, and a high-quality sound system. The padded bow seats offer comfort, while the bathroom and nursery for live bait provide added convenience. With outriggers, harpoon racks, and top-notch underwater sport fishing equipment, the Sea Hunt center console is perfect for experts seeking an exceptional fishing adventure.

item.title: Spearo 2
item.dc:creator: Jorge Gallegos
item.description:
Prosport Cataharan Center Console. Powered by twin 300HP Suzuki 4 stroke outboards
  • Length: 30 feet
  • Max Speed: 35 knots
  • Max Capacity: 6 pax (inshore) 4 pax (offshore)
item.content:encoded: Spearmex presents the Prosport Cataharan Center Console. Powered by twin 300HP Suzuki 4 stroke outboards This 30-feet boat has a maximum speed of 35 knots. With a maximum capacity of 6 pax (inshore) or 4 pax (offshore), it offers ample deck space for fishing. Prepare your underwater fishing equipment or get ready to dive as it also comes with an extendable roof for extra shade, padded seats, plotter bathroom, and an IDH locator. Equipped with a marine VHF radio, ZSound system, padded bow seats, living bait nursery, outriggers, racks for harpoons, and high-quality sport and underwater fishing equipment.
